channel.title: The Evolution of Coachella Artists on Coachella Artist Analysis
channel.description: Recent content in The Evolution of Coachella Artists on Coachella Artist Analysis

item.title: Data description
item.description: For this analysis, we gathered data from three sources: the Wikipedia page: “Coachella Festival Line-Ups,” the Spotify API and the MusixMatch API. With this, we created two datasets, for our artist data and for our song data. 1. Artist Data Contains all of the artists that have performed at Coachella, from 1999 to 2023. Contains information on which stage they performed on. Artist variables: id, music genre, followers, popularity level.
